Posts.Content: Denoby1030 wrote: I had a routine mammo a few weeks ago and they called me the next day to have more images of my right breast. I went the following tuesday for repeat and had an ultrasound right after. Radiologist recommended an MRI which is scheduled for tuesday. Why would they need an mri? Soooo nervous. Posts.Title: Mammo, ultrasound, now MRI...What happens next? Denoby1030 CLC
